tgt_original: sugandhikusumākīrṇe prāk prātarupaviśya ca ||8 ||  vimokṣamukhasaṃśuddhau hṛdīndau maṃ prabhojvalam |
svāsatsaṃkalpamātrotthaṃ tryadhvajaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam |  svapnasvapnādivat sarvaṃ triṣkṛtvā deśayāmyaham ||11 ||
śuddhaniḥśeṣasaṃkalpān pratyātmānandavedinaḥ |  saṃbuddhān śaraṇaṃ yāmi svaparārthaphalapradān ||14 ||
sattvārthe naiva bhavyo yatsa dbhistaiḥ syurguṇā hyamī ||6 ||
dvibhujāśliṣṭasatprajñaṃ vajraparyaṅkasusthiram |  vajrakhaḍgabhujaṃ savye vāme sanmaṇipadminam ||27 ||
protsṛjya navadhā devīḥ svavidyāntarniveśayet ||30 ||  svayoṣitpadmakarkaṭyāṃ suratodbhavamaṇḍalam |
kṣitīśakuliśākāśalokeśaskambhibhadrakaiḥ |  saṃpūrya cakṣurādīni tadbījaiḥ pauruṣaṃ vahet ||50 ||
kāmāhi māṃ guṇanidhiṃ bahuratnabhūtāṃ  yadīcchase jīvitu mahya (mañju)nātha ||43 ||
āgneyādicatuṣkoṇe pūrvadvāradviparśvayoḥ |  rūpādyā darpaṇādyaiḥ syuḥ kāyādyā tā(dyāstā)
cakre niveśya taccakraṃ cakṣuḥkāyādyadhiṣṭhitam |  prāgvasiktaṃ ca tad dhyāyānniṣyandādyadhimātrataḥ ||90 ||
amoghavajrasaṃbuddha sarvāśāparipūraka |  śuddhasvabhāvasaṃbhūta vajrasattva namo'stu te ||99 ||
kāyādisphārasaṃhāraiḥ kuryājjāpaṃ yathākramam ||110 ||  uccāryaivaṃ viyad vyāpya kāyādyaistaiḥ svaraśmibhiḥ |
nabuddhaughaṃ svātmanyante niveśayet ||112 ||  viṣyandādyadhimokṣaiśca bindusūkṣmatriguhyajāḥ |  dhyeyā mṛdvādibhirbhedairyogāḥ sevādivattathā ||113 ||
sarvadharmatayā śuddhaṃ tritattvairabhimantritam |  svādhidaivatasaccakraṃ prīṇayaṃstena pūjayet ||123 ||
samyagjñānavaśī dhyāyan kuryātkāryaṃ jagaddhitam |  dhātvaṇvantastrisaccakraiḥ pratibimbātmamūrtibhiḥ ||136 ||
tritattvairgarbhitotsargānanyān hṛdbījagarbhitān |  sānusvārādyavarṇāṃstu nāmno mantrān samuddharet ||140 ||
kāyavākcittaguhyākhyā karmadharmamahātmikā |  triguhyā samayā mudrā bījaṃ hṛdayamucyate ||141 ||
vighnāricakrayogasthaḥ svābhiṣekaṃ samādadet |  duṣṭānnikṛntayedevaṃ yogādvā svādhidaivatāt ||147 ||
om bhūḥ khamiti mantreṇa viyadbhūtāṃ vasundharām |
hū la hū iti vajrātmakṣmāṃ kṛtvā tāmadhiṣṭhayet ||148 ||
vighnānutsārya saṃkīlyābhyukṣya kṣmāṃ prārthya yācayet |  samādhitritayaṃ kṛtvā buddhādīnadhivāsya ca ||144 ||
datvā balyarghamāpūjya homairāpyāyya khe nyaset |  khānayet kṣmāṃ sunirvighnāṃ garttāpūre'pyayaṃ kramaḥ ||145 ||
om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
saṃvīkṣya kṣmāṃ sunirvighnāṃ tīkṣṇajvālākulaprabhām |  sīmāprākāradigbandhān dhiyā kṛtvādhivāsayet ||164 ||
tvaṃ devi sākṣibhūtāsi sarvabuddhān(nāṃ)tāyinām |  caryānayaviśeṣeṣu bhūmipāramitāsu ca ||165 ||
kṣmāṃ saṃlipya sugandhādyaiścitraiḥ puṣpaiḥ prakīrya ca |
pratidinaṃ trisandhyāsu baliṃ datvā tathā japet |
icchāmi likhituṃ nātha maṇḍalaṃ karuṇātmakam ||175 ||  śiṣyāṇāmanukampāyai yuṣmākaṃ pūjanāya ca |
phalasthā bodhisattvāśca yāścānyā mantradevatāḥ ||177 ||  devatālokapālāśca bhūtāḥ saṃbodhiśāsitāḥ |
amuko'haṃ mahāvajrī mañjuśryudayamaṇḍalam |  likhiṣyāmi jagacchuddhyai yathāśaktyupacārataḥ ||179 ||
kulino guṇinaḥ śrāddhānrūpavarṇavayo'nvitān ||182 ||  arthinaścābhiyuktāṃśca saugatānmantrasādhane |  virūpānnirguṇāṃścāpi hīnānapyadhivāsayet ||183 ||
evamuktvā tu tān śiṣyān dhiyā sā(svā)
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
ucchinnā durgati steṣāṃ sarvaduḥkhasya sambhavā |  yeṣāṃ caryāvare hyasminmatiratyantanirmalā ||207 ||
yena yūyaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ saputrairiha śāsane ||208 ||  sarve parigṛhītāḥ stha jāyamānā mahātmabhiḥ |
pṛṣṭvā śubhāśubhaṃ svapnaṃ hatvā kuṇḍalināśubham |  śiṣyānsaṃrakṣya tān yogyānsaṃvaraṃ grāhayettataḥ ||213 ||

src_original: འཁོར་ལོ་ལྷ་ཡི་དེ་ཉིད་དང་༎ སློབ་དཔོན་གྱི་ནི་ལས་རྣམས་དང་༎ སངས་རྒྱས་ཀུན་གྱི་དམ་ཚིག་དང་༎ སྡོམ་དང་གསང་བ་དམ་པ་དང་༏་། སེམས་ཅན་ཀུན་གྱི་དོན་གྱི་ཕྱིར་༎ རྟག་ཏུ་སློབ་དཔོན་བདག་འགྱུར་གསུངས་༎
tgt_original: cakradevatayostattvamācāryaparikarma ca ||214 ||  samayaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ saṃvaraṃ guhyamuttaram |  ācāryaḥ syāmahaṃ nityaṃ sarvasattvārthakāraṇāt ||215 ||
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||

src_original: སྡོམ་པ་རྣམས་ཀྱང་འཛིན་དུ་གཞུག་། རྣལ་འབྱོར་མཉམ་གཞག་འཁོར་ལོ་མཆོག་། ལེགས་མཆོག་བློ་ཡིས་མཁའ་ལ་བཞག་། རྟག་པ་ལ་སོགས་དངོས་འདྲ་༄༧༨ཨ་༌་༎ ཞིང་༏་། དེ་མདོག་ས་བོན་ལས་བྱུང་བ་༎
tgt_original: yogamādhāya saccakraṃ saṃpūjya khe dhiyā nyaset ||216 ||  śāśvatādisvarūpābhaṃ tadvarṇabījasaṃbhavam |
animittairasiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ |  hīnātiriktato rogā diṅmohe śiṣyavibhramaḥ ||229 ||

src_original: འཁོར་ལོ་ལ་སོགས་ཀ་བའི་ཐིག་། ཚོན་གྱིས་དང་ས་གཞི་མཉམ་༎ རྟ་བབས་སྒོ་ཡི་སུམ་འགྱུར་ཏེ་༎ བ་དན་ཕྲེང་བ་རྣམས་དང་ལྡན་༎ དྲིལ་བུ་མཆོག་ནི་རླུང་གིས་བསྐྱོད་༎ བ་དན་ཕྱི་ཡི་མཚམས་སུ་བྱ་༎
tgt_original: cakrādyastambhasūtrāṇāṃ bhūmistulyā rajo bhuvā ||236 ||  toraṇaṃ triguṇaṃ dvārātpatākāghaṇṭayānvitam |  saddhaṇṭāmārutoddhūtā patākā bāhyakoṇataḥ ||237 ||
saṃbuddhajñānakāyatvādvāgmī vajrakule smṛtaḥ ||238 ||  dharmakāyātmasaṃśuddhau cittamaṇḍalamasya tu |
śvetaṃ pītaṃ tathā raktaṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇameva ca |
śvetavajramayī sūcī sauvarṇālambanāparā |  padmarāgamayī sūcī tathā marakatāparā ||247 ||  kṛṣṇābhyantarato jñeyā eṣa raṅgakramo'sya tu |
samapradakṣiṇācchinnāvakrāṃ rekhā prapātayet ||244 ||  samāṃ ca pātayedrekhāṃ dvāraviśatibhāgikām |

src_original: ཏིཤཐ་ཏིཤཐ་། བནདྷ་བནདྷ་། ཧ་ན་ཧ་ན་། ད་ཧ་ད་ཧ་། གཛཛ་གཛཛ་། བི་སཕོ་ཏ་ཡ་བི་སཕོ་ཏ་ཡ་། སརྦ་བིགྷནའ་ན་བི་ནའ་ཡ་ཀའ་ན་མ་ཧའ་ག་ན་པ་ཏི་ཛའི་བི་ཏའནཏ་ཀ་ར་ཡ་ཧའུམ་ཕཏ་།
tgt_original: namo vajrakrodhāya mahādaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhairavāya asimuṣalaparśupāśahastāya |  om amṛtakuṇḍali kha-kha-khāhi-khāhi tiṣṭha-tiṣṭha bandha-bandha hana-hana daha- daha garja- garja visphoṭaya-visphoṭaya sarvavighnavināyakān mahāgaṇapatijīvitāntakarāya hū phaṭ |
sthūlapāte bhaved vyādhiḥ kṛśayā dhananāśanam ||245 ||  vidveṣo vakrayā mṛtyuśchinnayā guruśiṣyayoḥ |
prāgvatprajñāṅgasaṃyogād buddhān svāntarniveśya ca |  saccittena viyadvyāpya cakrapārśvakṛtāspadān ||259 ||
taiḥ samāyātavighnāṃstānsamutsāryābhirakṣya ca |  yamāryādibhirākṛṣyāveśya badhvā vaśaṃ nayet ||260 ||
cakṣuḥkāyādyadhiṣṭhāyārghābhiṣekābhipūjanam |  kṛtvā stutvātha saṃprīṇya japtvā vibhāvya toṣayet ||261 ||
dikpālān svasvayogasthān prapūjya maṇḍalaṃ viśet ||262 ||  trailokyavijayo bhūtvā yathāptyābharaṇāmbaraḥ |
kṛtapradakṣiṇaścakraṃ natvā homena pūra(ja)yet ||263 ||  caturaṅgphalamātyajya tanmānābjapraphullayā |
dvāreṣu sarvathā jñātvā sphuṭaṃ dhyātvā svacakrakam ||258 ||
strukstruve hastadaṇḍādho vajraratnaistadūrdhvataḥ |  caturastrāṅgulā pātrī dvyaṅgulakhātavajradhā(jrādhaḥ) ||271 ||  caturaṅgulavajrāntarante padmadalākṛtiḥ |
dhyātvā pītaṃ trivaktraṃ tu pīnaṃ prajñāṅgasaṅginam |
tena satyena me nātha kāmāṃstvaṃ paripūraya ||288 ||
tathātā tattvaniryātā iti satyena maṇḍale |  pratibimbaṃ sphuṭaṃ śiṣyāḥ sarve paśyantvakalmaṣāḥ ||290 ||
raktāmbaraṃ tadāsyaṃ ca pṛcchet kastvamiti priya |
pañcākṣarairathāpyevaṃ vācyaṃ satsaṃvaragrahe ||294 ||  adya tvaṃ sarvatathāgatakule praviṣṭaḥ |
tadahaṃ te vajrajñānamutpādayāmi yena jñānena tvaṃ sarvatathāgatasiddhīrapi prāpyasi kimutānyāḥ siddhīḥ |
na ca tvayādṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya purato vaktavyam |  mā te samayo vyathe(vyarthaṃ gacche)
diti taddhṛdi vajramāsthāpya |  om vajrasattva svayaṃ te'dya hṛdaye samavasthitaḥ ||295 ||
nirbhidya tatkṣaṇaṃ yāyād yadi brūyādimaṃ nayam |
idaṃ te nārakaṃ vāri samayātikramād dahet |
samayarakṣaṇāt siddhiḥ piba vajrāmṛtodakam ||297 ||  om vajrodaka ṭhaḥ ||
adyaprabhṛti tavāhaṃ vajrapāṇiryadahaṃ brūyāmima kuru tat tvayā kartavyam |
na cāhamavamantavyo mā te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyāṃ kṛtvā narakapatanaṃ syāt |
yogacittaṃ samutpādya hṛdi vajraṃ hṛdā nyaset ||293 ||
mantraḥ- om sarvayogacittamutpādayāmi surate samayastvaṃ hoḥ sidhya vajra yathāsukham |
na ca tvayedaṃ sarvatathāgataparamarahasyamamaṇḍalapraviṣṭāya vaktavyaṃ na cāśraddhā[ya dā]tavyamiti vācyam |
hṛdi saṃgrāhya tadvajraṃ vajreṇāpyabhiṣecayet ||307 ||  adyābhiṣiktastvamasi buddhairvajrābhiṣekataḥ |
om vajrasattva tvāmabhiṣiñcāmi vajranāmābhiṣekataḥ |  he amuka vajra !  mūrdhnināmataḥ |
yadyad bhāti svasarvasvaṃ mukhyaṃ tanmañjurāṭ svayam |
dharmāḥ śuddhāḥ prakṛtyā yad buddhajñānacayaḥ sa hi ||309 ||
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryaṃ vajrapāṇi dṛḍhavratam ||313 ||
om sarvatathāgatasiddhivajrasamaye tiṣṭha eṣa tvāṃ dhārayāmi hīḥ hi hi hi hi hū |
tvayāpi hi sadā dhāryā bodhiragrā jinairmatā |
sarve sarvādhipatyā tu vajrānto he niyojitāḥ ||310 ||
vajraṃ satpratyavekṣātmādhipaḥ kṛtyakaro'rthadaḥ ||311 ||  jñānaṃ vidyātra vajraṃ syāddhāturgotraṃ vaśīhya(kṛ)taḥ |
tatsmṛtistatra yā śraddhā prāgdvāraṃ bodhaye matam ||331 ||
paścimaṃ ṛddhipādāstu dvāraṃ tat smṛtiratra tu ||333 ||
prajñājñānāmṛtaṃ pītaṃ vajriṇāṃ kalaśaṃ tu tat |
avikalpāttu gāmbhīryamaudāryaṃ svaparodayāt |  gāmbhīryaudāryataścetaḥ prajñopāyātmakaṃ matam ||351 ||
iyaṃ te dhāraṇī ramyā sevyā buddhaiḥ prakalpitā ||365 ||
maṇḍalaṃ devatātattvamācāryaparikarma ca |  saṃkathya guhyaprajñābhyāṃ siktvā tattvaṃ samuddiśet ||367 ||
na tathā bodhicaryādyairanyai rvāpi nayaiḥ śubhaiḥ |  prāpyante sarvabuddhādyā yathābhiṣekādito nayāt ||368 ||
samayaṃ rakṣayedbhartuḥ saṃvaraṃ pālayetsadā |  pañcamāṃsāmṛtāṃ(taṃ)  bhakṣyaṃ rakṣo(kṣyo)
pratidinaṃ catuḥsandhyaṃ samādhitrayayogavān |  bhūtvā sādhaya saṃsiddhiṃ sāmānyetarabhāvanīm ||375 ||
vidyādharastrisāhastre vajrī sarvajagatpatiḥ ||376 ||  śāntipuṣṭyādi yatkarma tadanyadvā yadīpsitam
ato bodhyarthiko mantrī kāyavākcittaceṣṭitam |  karma kuryādvidhānena sarvaṃ tadbodhaye matam ||379 ||  yathā praviṣṭaśiṣyebhyo'nuśaṃsārthibhya ityapi |
he vajra nāma tathāgata siddhaye bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ |  vyākriyate'nayā yastu mantrī sarvajagatpatiḥ |
bodhāvanuttarāyāṃ hi vyākuryātsugatairapi ||373 ||  yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ sattvā yānti svabhāvataḥ |
tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryādrāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||374 ||
ayaṃ vaḥ satataṃ rakṣaḥ(kṣyaḥ)  siddhaḥ samayasaṃvaraḥ |
ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
vajraṃ ghaṇṭā ca mudrā ca na vai tyājyā kadācana |
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena vajrācāryaṃ mahāgurum |  pracchannavarakalyāṇaṃ nāvamanyet kadācana ||391 ||
anurūpaṃ ca te deyaṃ gurubhaktaṃ sadakṣiṇam |
tato jvarādayastāpā na bhūyaḥ prabhavanti hi ||392 ||
nityaṃ ca gurave deyaṃ sarvabuddhasamo hyasau ||393 ||
tad dānāt puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ sambhārādbodhiruttamā |  datte'smai sarvabuddhebhyo dattaṃ bhavati śāśvatam ||394 ||
adya vaḥ saphalaṃ janma yadasmin supratiṣṭhitāḥ |
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |  yasyotpādanamātreṇa buddha eva na saṃśayaḥ ||385 ||
saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
adya mārān vinirjitya praviṣṭāḥ paramaṃ puram |
dattvārthine rajaḥ stokaṃ mahattoye rajaḥ sṛjet ||405 ||
garttāpūre pratiṣṭhāyāṃ home cakre ca yaddhanam |  ācāryasyaiva tatsarvamityāha varavajradhṛk ||406 ||
jagati laghusukhe'dya vajrasattva-  pratisamaśāśvatatāṃ gatā bhavantaḥ ||398 ||
manasokto vidhiḥ śreṣṭho vāṅmātreṇātra kiṃ bhavet ||416 ||
